title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: How to Update Payment Information
content:
Users can update their payment method through the app:

- Navigate to 'My Account' > 'Payment Methods'
- Add new card or update existing details
- Changes take effect immediately for future billing
- Contact support if payment fails after update

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your payment information in the 'Payment Methods' section of your account settings. Changes are applied right away."

title: What to Do If an Experience is Cancelled
content:
If an experience is cancelled by the venue:

- Users receive automatic notification via app
- Full refund processed within 3-5 business days
- Alternative experience suggestions provided
- No quota deduction for cancelled events

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If an experience is cancelled, you'll be notified automatically and receive a full refund. We'll also suggest alternative experiences."

title: How to Share Experiences with Friends
content:
CultPass allows sharing experiences:

- Up to 2 additional guests per experience
- Guests need to download the app and link to your account
- Premium experiences may have sharing restrictions
- All participants must arrive together

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can bring up to 2 friends to most experiences. They need to download the app and link to your account during reservation."

title: Understanding Premium vs Basic Experiences
content:
Premium experiences offer enhanced features:

- Priority access and seating
- Exclusive content or behind-the-scenes access
- Higher quality amenities
- Additional cost beyond basic subscription

Basic experiences are included in monthly quota.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Premium experiences offer enhanced features like priority access and exclusive content, but require an additional fee beyond your basic subscription."

title: How to View Reservation History
content:
Access your complete reservation history:

- Go to 'My Reservations' in the app
- Filter by date, status, or experience type
- View past and upcoming reservations
- Download receipts for completed experiences

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your reservation history is available in the 'My Reservations' section, where you can filter and view all past and upcoming experiences."

title: Troubleshooting App Performance Issues
content:
If the app is slow or crashing:

- Ensure you have the latest app version
- Clear app cache and restart device
- Check internet connection stability
- Reinstall app if issues persist

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try updating the app to the latest version and clearing the cache. If problems continue, reinstalling the app often helps."

title: How to Contact Venue Partners
content:
For venue-specific questions:

- Use the 'Contact Venue' button in experience details
- Direct communication through CultPass platform
- Support team monitors all communications
- Emergency contacts available for urgent issues

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can contact the venue directly through the 'Contact Venue' button in the experience details within the app."

title: Managing Account Privacy Settings
content:
Control your privacy preferences:

- Adjust profile visibility to friends or private
- Opt-in/out of marketing communications
- Manage data sharing with partners
- View and download your data anytime

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can manage your privacy settings in the account section, including profile visibility and communication preferences."

title: How to Redeem Special Offers
content:
Take advantage of exclusive offers:

- Check 'Offers' tab regularly for promotions
- Automatic application at checkout
- Limited time deals and partner discounts
- Combine with existing subscriptions

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Special offers are available in the 'Offers' tab and are automatically applied during reservation when eligible."

title: Understanding Quota Usage and Limits
content:
Monthly quota management:

- Track usage in 'My Account' dashboard
- 4 experiences per month for basic tier
- Unused quotas don't roll over
- Upgrade to premium for higher limits

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You have 4 experiences per month with your basic subscription. Track your usage in the account dashboard."
